column3: How about starting with just the shellcheck commit, and maybe pairing it with a shellcheck test/linter? Just a suggestion.
I'm afraid this PR is redundant due to #13623, which ports the script to Python. Please help reviewing and testing that one instead.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13623 (Migrate gitian-build.sh to python by ken2812221)
* #13171 (Change gitian-descriptors to use bionic instead by ken2812221)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merg
